sections.title: Why GynoSMART SERVICE?
sections.content:
There are various electronic menstruation and ovulation Apps available in various App-stores. What then make GynoSMART standout? 

**Offline Push Notifications (SMS)**

GynoSMART is designed for use in resource limited countries. It is thus designed to be accessible via multiple offline channels â€“ SMS, Telecom USSD and SIM ToolKit using simple USSD commands. 

The service also sends auto reminders (push notification) 2 days and a day to the predicted ovulation and menstruation.
